METADATA.description: Governing System Integrity Model (GSIM) Enforcement Map, detailing standardized violation codes mapped to mandatory execution sequences.

GSIM-C-SEC-001.name: Unauthorized Core System Write Attempt
GSIM-C-SEC-001.rationale: Immediate self-defense against potential core compromise.

GSIM-H-RES-005.name: Sustained Excessive Resource Consumption
GSIM-H-RES-005.rationale: Automated economic correction and performance throttling to prevent resource pooling imbalance.

GSIM-M-POL-012.name: Minor Data Schema Validation Failure
GSIM-M-POL-012.rationale: Data integrity breach requires transactional rollback and re-attempt to stabilize consistency.
